name: Delusion Gallery
description:
Submission to NaNoRenO 2018

Note: All donations currently go to Itch.io as a thanks for being a great DRM-free platform <3

Gallium Games is a side branch of Argent Games

Summary

You, the MC, stumble inside a strange building you’ve never seen before – a wax museum full of faceless exhibits. Two mysterious curators live in the museum, but for some reason, neither seems to know about the other. You have hundreds of questions, yet you’re not sure if you want to hear the answers. 

Features

  • Genre: Impressionistic horror
  • Rating: PG-13 (language, violence, disturbing themes)
  • 9 endings
  • ~20,000 words
  • Hugely non-linear; every playthrough is very different
Team
  • Argent Games with Dovah on Writing/Programming/GUI and Gamma quacking about http://argentgames.co/

  • Juliane Ashwood https://manuscriptmuse.tumblr.com/ (Writing, Programming)
  • Gin Kreuz http://ginkreuz.com (Composer)
  • Christopher Amador  (Voice Actor)
  • Ryowa (Logo) http://carbohydrate.xii.jp
  • Aoi Kaduki (OP vocals) http://stray.raindrop.jp/crystalpalace/
